name: Royalquiz
overview:
Royalquiz offers a quiz gaming platform where you can compete live against friends and others, play casual quiz games for free as well as participate in skill games with prizes. You can also create your own quizzes and place them as a widget on blogs, social networks etc. Royalquiz foremost distributes the games in co-operation with online partners. You can play across borders in your own language.

International site: www.royalquiz.com - widgets for blogs and social networks.

Local sites: www.royalquiz.co.uk and www.royalquiz.se - here you can also play skill games for money and prizes.

Example of widgets: www.myspace.com/fredrikcjpersson

Royalquiz was started by three serial entrepreneurs from Stockholm, Sweden. The company has angel funding and works with several of the largest sites in Sweden, for example MSN, and is now expanding to new markets.
